decks.notes: This deck focuses on using the Greasefang Parhelion combo to generate powerful tokens and control the board. By using cards like Monument to Endurance and Sheltered by Ghosts to protect your creatures and Thoughtseize to disrupt your opponent's strategy, you can establish a strong board presence. The inclusion of Parhelion II and Overlord of the Balemurk allows for explosive plays, while cards like Fatal Push provide removal options. The goal is to overwhelm your opponent with resilient creatures and finish them off with the Greasefang Parhelion combo.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on punishing opponents with a fast and aggressive strategy. Utilizing powerful creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, alongside disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Duress, the deck aims to pressure opponents while stripping away their resources. The deck also includes versatile removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to maintain control of the board. With a mix of resilient threats and efficient removal, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly deploy a wide variety of creatures with varying abilities and power levels to overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently. The deck utilizes a combination of aggro and control elements to maintain board presence and push for a fast victory. Cards like Mox Amber and Relic of Legends help ramp up mana quickly, while other creatures like Jirina, Dauntless General and Zack Fair provide additional support and synergy. Additionally, the included lands and artifacts offer protection and flexibility in order to outpace the opponent.

The main focus of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to quickly apply pressure on opponents by playing aggressive creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Bloodtithe Harvester. It also includes powerful removal spells like Fatal Push and Abrade to control the board and disrupt opponent's strategies. The deck aims to end games quickly by efficiently attacking the opponent's life total while also disrupting their plans with cards like Thoughtseize and Duress. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, with various dual lands and utility lands like Mutavault and Blightstep Pathway.

This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with instants and sorceries to bring back Arclight Phoenix and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. It also utilizes card draw and selection to maintain consistency and fuel the graveyard. The deck aims to be fast-paced and proactive, using efficient spells and synergies to put pressure on the opponent and close out the game quickly. The inclusion of Treasure Cruise and Proft's Eidetic Memory helps to refuel the hand and continue pushing the advantage. Additionally, the deck includes a mix of removal spells and versatile threats to handle different matchups effectively.

The main focus of this Dimir Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's hand and board state while simultaneously fueling graveyard synergies. This is achieved through cards like Duress, Thoughtseize, and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's plans, along with Liliana of the Veil and Graveyard Trespasser to take advantage of cards being discarded. Quantum Riddler and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse provide powerful threats on the board, while Ledger Shredder helps with card advantage. The land base is designed to support the deck's color requirements while also enabling potential graveyard interactions.

The main concept of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to apply pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By combining efficient removal like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize with powerful threats like Bloodtithe Harvester and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, the deck aims to build a board presence quickly and disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a mix of burn spells and hand disruption, along with versatile lands like Mutavault and Blightstep Pathway, the deck is designed to keep opponents on the back foot and close out games swiftly.

This UW Control deck focuses on utilizing cards that allow for card advantage, counter spells, and board control in order to outlast opponents and control the game. The deck also includes a companion, Kaheera, the Orphanguard, to provide additional synergy with certain creature types. Overall, the deck aims to control the game by managing resources effectively, countering opponents' threats, and gradually building towards a win condition through the use of powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, and board wipes like Supreme Verdict.

The main concept of this deck revolves around utilizing Greasefang Parhelion's abilities in combination with other cards like Monument to Endurance and Seasoned Hallowblade to create a powerful combo that can overwhelm opponents quickly. The deck also includes cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push for control and removal, as well as cards like Fleeting Spirit and Sheltered by Ghosts for added defense. Overall, the key strategy is to build up a strong board presence while disrupting the opponent's game plan, ultimately leading to a decisive victory.

This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deplete their life total. The key strategy is to apply early pressure with low-cost creatures like Emberheart Challenger and Heartfire Hero, while utilizing burn spells like Lightning Strike and Burst Lightning to clear the way and finish off the opponent. Cards like Kumano, Faces Kakkazan and Monstrous Rage provide additional firepower, while cards like Robber of the Rich and Reckless Rage provide disruption and removal. The deck aims to maintain a fast and relentless pace to secure victory.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly bringing out powerful creature threats like Bloodtithe Harvester and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to overwhelm the opponent. It includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Duress to control the opponent's hand, as well as removal spells like Fatal Push and Abrade to deal with threats. The deck's mana base is optimized to ensure consistent casting of its spells, with cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker providing additional synergy and advantage. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan to secure a swift victory.

This Rakdos Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. The deck utilizes powerful cards like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Bloodtithe Harvester to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Duress. The deck also includes versatile removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to deal with opposing threats. The strategy is to maintain a strong board presence while controlling the opponent's resources, ultimately leading to a quick victory.

The deck revolves around assembling a combo using Greasefang, Okiba Boss and Parhelion II to create a powerful board state. It utilizes cards like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize to control the opponent's board and hand, while Seasoned Hallowblade and Sheltered by Ghosts provide protection for key pieces. The inclusion of various lands like The Mycosynth Gardens and Geier Reach Sanitarium help generate additional value and resources for the combo. Overall, the deck focuses on quickly assembling its combo pieces and overwhelming the opponent with a dominating board presence.

The main concept of this UW Control deck is to control the game through card advantage, counterspells, board wipes, and resource denial. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while drawing cards and generating value to eventually overwhelm them with powerful threats like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Narset, Parter of Veils. Using cards like Consult the Star Charts for card selection and March of Otherworldly Light for card advantage, the deck can outlast and outmaneuver opponents in a longer game.

The main concept of this Red Deck Wins aggro deck is to quickly deploy aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage to the opponent's life total as fast as possible. The deck focuses on playing efficient creatures like Robber of the Rich and Emberheart Challenger, while also using burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike to clear the way and finish off opponents. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of creature pressure and direct damage, utilizing cards like Monstrous Rage and Reckless Rage to maintain aggression.

This deck focuses on aggressive play using Rakdos colors, employing powerful creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck utilizes cards like Bloodtithe Harvester, Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, and Mutavault to apply pressure, while also including removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to deal with threats. Thoughtseize and Duress help disrupt the opponent's game plan, while Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Fear of Missing Out provide additional ways to close out the game quickly. Overall, the deck aims to win through a combination of early aggression and disruption.
